deprecated_platform_yaml.title: Configuring rest via YAML is being migrated to top-level configuration
deprecated_platform_yaml.description:
Configuring rest in YAML is still allowed under the integration key, but it being removed under the platform key.

Please adjust your YAML configuration accordingly.

reload.name: [%key:common::action::reload%]
reload.description: Reloads REST entities from the YAML-configuration.
